languages.text: The creature is cursed. Its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is decreased by −15, and it becomes a high-{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemies.
languages.original_text: Это существо проклято. Оно становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для противников, а его {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} уменьшается на 15.

traits.locale_text: The creature is cursed. Its dodge is decreased by −15, and it becomes a high-priority target for enemies.
The creature is cursed. Its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is decreased by −15, and it becomes a high-{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemies.

languages.text: Die Kreatur ist verflucht. Ihr {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} wird um −15 verringert und sie wird für Gegner zu einem Ziel mit hoher {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Priorität{/g}.
languages.original_text: The creature is cursed. Its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is decreased by −15, and it becomes a high-{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemies.

traits.locale_text: Die Kreatur ist verflucht. Ihr {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} wird um -15 verringert und sie wird für Gegner zu einem Ziel mit hoher {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Priorität{/g}.

languages.text: La créature est maudite. Son {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} baisse de −15, et elle devient une {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} pour les ennemis.
languages.original_text: The creature is cursed. Its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is decreased by −15, and it becomes a high-{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemies.

traits.locale_text: La créature est maudite. Son {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} baisse de -15, et elle devient une {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} pour les ennemis.

languages.text: 此生物遭到了诅咒。{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}降低15%，还会成为所有敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}。
languages.original_text: The creature is cursed. Its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is decreased by −15, and it becomes a high-{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemies.

languages.original_text: The creature is cursed. Its dodge is decreased by −15, and it becomes a high-priority target for enemies.

languages.text: La criatura está maldita. Su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} se reduce en −15 y se convierte en un {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} para los enemigos.

languages.text: Это существо проклято. Оно становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для противников, а его {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} уменьшается на 15.

Это существо проклято. Оно становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для противников, а его {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонение{/g} уменьшается на 15.

languages.text: クリーチャーに呪いがかかる。{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}が15減少し、敵にとって{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先順位の高いターゲット{/g}となる。
